entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few showers near the British Columbia border this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
